original_text: Then King Cyrus brought the valuable things that King Nebuchadnezzar had taken from the Lord's temple in Jerusalem. Nebuchadnezzar had taken them from Jerusalem and brought them to Babylon. He had put them in the temple of his own gods.
korean_text: 고레스 왕이 또 여호와의 성전 그릇을 꺼내니 옛적에 느부갓네살이 예루살렘에서 옮겨다가 자기 신들의 신당에 두었던 것이라

sentences.original_text: Then King Cyrus brought the valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 고레스 왕은 귀중한 것들을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: from the Lord's temple in Jerusalem
Nebuchadnezzar had taken them from Jerusalem
He had put them in the temple
